languages.text: "Проклятье, там Лорд-капитан с вами?!" — раздалось из вокса. И затем сразу: "П-прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость! Просто думал напугать ребят!"

traits.locale_text: "Проклятье, там Лорд-капитан с вами?!" — раздалось из вокса. И затем сразу: "П-прошу прощения, Ваше Благородие! Просто думал напугать ребят!"

languages.text: "Crap, the Lord Captain's with you?" comes Vesti's voice from the speakers, followed immediately by, "M-my sincere apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I just wanted to spook the guys a little!"
languages.original_text: "Проклятье, там Лорд-капитан с вами?!" — раздалось из вокса. И затем сразу: "П-прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость! Просто думал напугать ребят!"

languages.text: «Mierda, ¿está ahí nuestr{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}?». La voz de Vesti volvió a llegar de los altavoces. El capitán continuó: «¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, mil{mf|ord|ady}! ¡Solo quería asustar un poco a los muchachos!».
languages.original_text: "Crap, the Lord Captain's with you?" comes Vesti's voice from the speakers, followed immediately by, "M-my sincere apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I just wanted to spook the guys a little!"

traits.locale_text: «Mierda, ¿está ahí nuestr{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}?». La voz de Vesti volvió a llegar de los altavoces. El capitán continuó: «¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, mil{mf|ord|ady}! ¡Solo quería asustar un poco a los muchachos!».

languages.text: “卧槽！原来舰长大人就在你身边吗？”维斯提的声音从扬声器里响了起来，随后立刻说道，“我……我真诚地道歉，大人！我只是想吓唬这些人一下而已！”
languages.original_text: "Crap, the Lord Captain's with you?" comes Vesti's voice from the speakers, followed immediately by, "M-my sincere apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I just wanted to spook the guys a little!"

traits.locale_text: “卧槽！原来舰长大人就在你身边吗？”维斯提的声音从扬声器里响了起来，随后立刻说道，“我……我真诚地道歉，大人！我只是想吓唬这些人一下而已！”

languages.text: 「何っ、ロード・キャプテンもご一緒だと？」スピーカーからヴェスティの声が聞こえると、すぐに挨拶が聞こえた。「も、申し訳ございません、陛下！ほんのちょっと皆の者を驚かせたくて…！」
languages.original_text: "Crap, the Lord Captain's with you?" comes Vesti's voice from the speakers, followed immediately by, "M-my sincere apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I just wanted to spook the guys a little!"

traits.locale_text: 「何っ、ロード・キャプテンもご一緒だと？」スピーカーからヴェスティの声が聞こえると、すぐに挨拶が聞こえた。「も、申し訳ございません、陛下！ほんのちょっと皆の者を驚かせたくて…！」

languages.text: "Verdammt, der Lord Captain ist bei Euch?", tönte Vestis Stimme aus dem Lautsprecher, sofort gefolgt von: "I-ich bitte vielmals um Entschuldigung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! I-ich wollte den Jungs nur etwas Angst einjagen!"
languages.original_text: "Crap, the Lord Captain's with you?" comes Vesti's voice from the speakers, followed immediately by, "M-my sincere apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I just wanted to spook the guys a little!"

traits.locale_text: "Verdammt, der Lord Captain ist bei Euch?", tönte Vestis Stimme aus dem Lautsprecher, sofort gefolgt von: "I-ich bitte vielmals um Entschuldigung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! I-ich wollte den Jungs nur etwas Angst einjagen!"

languages.text: « Merde, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} est avec toi ? demanda Vesti par le vox. Je... Je vous prie de m'excuser, Votre Seigneurie ! Je voulais juste leur faire une petite frayeur ! »
languages.original_text: "Crap, the Lord Captain's with you?" comes Vesti's voice from the speakers, followed immediately by, "M-my sincere apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I just wanted to spook the guys a little!"

traits.locale_text: « Merde, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} est avec toi ? demanda Vesti par le vox. Je... Je vous prie de m'excuser, Votre Seigneurie ! Je voulais juste leur faire une petite frayeur ! »

languages.text: Vesti'nin sesi hoparlörden yükseldi. "Kahretsin, Lord Kaptan yanında mı?" Vakit kaybetmeden konuşmaya devam etti. "Ç... Çok özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yalnızca bizimkileri birazcık ürkütmek istemiştim!"
languages.original_text: "Crap, the Lord Captain's with you?" comes Vesti's voice from the speakers, followed immediately by, "M-my sincere apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I just wanted to spook the guys a little!"

traits.locale_text: Vesti'nin sesi hoparlörden yükseldi: "Kahretsin, Lord Kaptan yanında mı?" Vakit kaybetmeden konuşmaya devam etti. "Ç… Çok özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yalnızca bizimkileri biraz ürkütmek istemiştim!"
